body:
Hi @tucaoxingren ,

**For English only**, other languages will not accept.

You can close this issue and submit a new issue in English again.
What is your SQL?   @xilipilige

I just use the dbeaver to try to connect to the sharding proxy, but report this exception
@RaigorJiang

So what is your DBeaver version?         

Yes, there are some issues for Proxy with PostgreSQL,  like #3104 , #3555, #3556 ,
If you are interested, we can improve it together.

DBeaver's version is 5.1.2 Community Edition

I like shardingsphere very much. I will try my best to participate in the community
When I use DBeaver 6.0 to connect to Proxy, the error is like #3104 ,  I will try your version.
@RaigorJiang Do you fix this issue?If not, I will fix this~

Hi @SteNicholas 
I have read the document and code,  but haven't found a solution yet. 
If you know how to fix it,  please do it, thank you!

Maybe we need to discuss this pr.
User maybe need to know `masterDataSourceName` on the API, so we need to keep this parameter.
By the way, we may supported multiple master data sources in future.
@RaigorJiang  Great, assigned
If do not config `act_id_membership` and default data source, how shardingsphere to know which data source to be execute for this table?
Sharding-scaling has been merged to branch `sharding-scaling`
![a56247a02313a40ebdcf2da3860540f](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26484302/69597719-daeb6500-1041-11ea-9edb-7cb78d6f6be0.png)
Can you change title for search friendly?
Can not support subquery now

> 您可以更改标题以方便搜索吗？

ok
relation: #1176
@RaigorJiang You can refer to EncryptStatementTest unit test~

Hi, @xilipilige 
I test DBeaver 5.1.2 Community Edition,  with sharding proxy 4.0.0-RC3 binary package, the exception is as same as yours.

Then I use  DBeaver 5.1.2 to test the latest source code of SS(dev branch), and the exception is still
`java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot find JDBC type '2003' in PostgreSQL column type`.

When the exception occurs, logic sql is : 
`SELECT db.oid,db.*
FROM pg_catalog.pg_database db WHERE datallowconn  AND NOT datistemplate 
ORDER BY db.datname`

三只松鼠    http://www.3songshu.com/
![图片](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13522975/69606552-1431ce00-105e-11ea-8bf2-2652389a1b64.png)

@ssxlulu Yes, We need move assembly from sharding-scaling-bootstrap to sharding-scaling-distribution

It should be added to #3598

Hi @infinite-m ,

Please reference this issue: #3582 .

application.yml
```
spring:
  shardingsphere:
    datasource:
      names: master,slave0 #数据源名称，多数据源以逗号分隔
      master:
        type: com.alibaba.druid.pool.DruidDataSource
        driver-class-name: com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
        url: jdbc:mysql://xxx?useUnicode=true&useSSL=false&characterEncoding=utf8&tinyInt1isBit=false&serverTimezone=Asia/Shanghai
        username: 
        password: 
        # 连接池配置
        initial-size: 1
        max-active: 200
        min-idle: 1
        max-wait: 60000
        pool-prepared-statements: true
        max-pool-prepared-statement-per-connection-size: 20
        validation-query: select 'x' FROM DUAL
        test-on-borrow: false
        test-on-return: false
        test-while-idle: true
        time-between-eviction-runs-millis: 60000
        min-evictable-idle-time-millis: 30000
        async-init: true
      slave0:
        type: com.alibaba.druid.pool.DruidDataSource
        driver-class-name: com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
        url: jdbc:mysql://xxx?useUnicode=true&useSSL=false&characterEncoding=utf8&tinyInt1isBit=false&serverTimezone=Asia/Shanghai
        username: 
        password: 
        # 连接池配置
        initial-size: 1
        max-active: 200
        min-idle: 1
        max-wait: 60000
        pool-prepared-statements: true
        max-pool-prepared-statement-per-connection-size: 20
        validation-query: select 'x' FROM DUAL
        test-on-borrow: false
        test-on-return: false
        test-while-idle: true
        time-between-eviction-runs-millis: 60000
        min-evictable-idle-time-millis: 30000
        async-init: true
    props:
      sql.show: true #是否开启SQL显示，默认值: false
    sharding:
      default-table-strategy: #默认表分片策略
        complex:
          sharding-columns: id,created_time
          algorithm-class-name: xxx.YearComplexShardingAlgorithm
      tables:
        case_object:
          actual-data-nodes: ds0.case_object_$->{2017..2022}
          table-strategy: #分表策略
            complex:
              sharding-columns: id,created_time
              algorithm-class-name: xxxYearComplexShardingAlgorithm
      master-slave-rules:
        ds0:
          master-data-source-name: master #主库数据源名称
          slave-data-source-names: slave0 #从库数据源名称列表
      broadcast-tables: 
      binding-tables:
        - case_object, case_node
        - case_node, case_node_att
```
table info
```
CREATE TABLE `case_object_2017` (
  `id` varchar(32) NOT NULL COMMENT 'id',
  `case_code` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
  `sub_dis_id` varchar(12) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `created_by` varchar(32) NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `created_time` timestamp NOT NULL COMMENT '',
  `del_flag` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='';
```
I am working on task one, assignees this to me?
`fragmentation policy` should be `sharding strategy`, is it? Can you fix the title again?

> `fragmentation policy` should be `sharding strategy`, is it? Can you fix the title again?

Oh, sorry, English is not very good. I tried to use hint to segment, but I implemented hintshardingalgorithm interface in API and rewritten dosharding (), but I found that he didn't execute my implemented dosharding (). What's the problem? Thank you

the table SHARDING_TABLE_2015_01 and SHARDING_TABLE_2015_02 has 13,808,757 records 
i tracking code found that in the oracle driver will  execute
 `analyze table SHARDING_TABLE_2015_02 compute statistics` 
 execute once will take about  7.8 min .
I had update the commented.

The new configuration in a yml file, will like this:
```
spring:
    shardingsphere:
        orchestration:
            testname1:
                orchestration-type: registry_center,distributed_lock_management
                instance-type: zookeeper
                server-lists: 192.178.32.45:9001,192.178.32.45:9002,192.178.32.45:9003
                namespace: testnamspace1
                props: 
		  overwrite: false
                  retry-interval-milliseconds: 10
                  time-to-live-seconds: 10
                  max-retries: 10
                  operation-timeout-milliseconds: 10
                  digest: 
            testname2:
                orchestration-type: configuration_center
                instance-type: apollo
                server-lists: 192.178.32.45:9001,192.178.32.45:9002,192.178.32.45:9003
                namespace: testnamspace2
                props: 
                  overwrite: true
                  retry-interval-milliseconds: 10
                  time-to-live-seconds: 10
                  max-retries: 10
                  operation-timeout-milliseconds: 10
                  digest: 
```
I'd like to help you.
/run ci
/run ci

One of the scenes is parameter yearIsDateType. The storage value is integer, but jdbc default return date value, it can not  insert into destination column.

I think these statistics is for running metrics, scaling progress is use for determine when to switch.
These statistics can use in metrics module.

@ssxlulu , I think the scaling progress should include the progress information, such as rows number need to sync and how many rows has sync, or the delay of logs.

Most of items you lists is monitor data. I think we can add in future, not what we need now.
/run ci

> @ssxlulu , I think the scaling progress should include the progress information, such as rows number need to sync and how many rows has sync, or the delay of logs.
> 
> Most of items you lists is monitor data. I think we can add in future, not what we need now.

OK.
Yes,  you are right. If you want further information,please see https://shardingsphere.apache.org/document/current/cn/manual/sharding-jdbc/usage/hint/

I think Number of all tasks and Number of remaining tasks can be added to progress.
Rows need to synchronize and Rows have been synchronized should be included in history sync progress.
The log position and delay second should be included in real time sync progress.

Mm-hmm. today we implemented and tested the hint sharding method. After evaluation, it seems that it is not good. If this sharding method is used in batch insertion, it will cause data sharding failure. Because it is an insert completed under the same connection, and the sharding value is only set once, so this batch of data can only be distributed in the database or table under the sharding value
